meanings.definition: To investigate or inquire into something.
meanings.sent1: The detective indagates the crime scene for clues.
meanings.sent2: She always indagates before making a decision.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat indagates every corner of the house.
meanings.sent4: His mind indagates the mysteries of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The scientist indagates the unknown with passion.

meanings.definition: The act of searching or examining closely.
meanings.sent1: The indagates of the evidence revealed new information.
meanings.sent2: Her indagates into the ancient artifact were thorough.
meanings.sent3: The indagates of the lost treasure led to a surprising discovery.
meanings.sent4: The indagates of the document uncovered hidden secrets.
meanings.sent5: The indagates of the painting exposed hidden details.
